query.name: SELECT_ALL_STRUCTURES_WITH_NO_RESOURCE
query.default: SELECT STR.STRUCTURE_ID, STR.PARENT_ID, STR.RESOURCE_ID, STR.RESOURCE_PATH FROM CMS_${PROJECT}_STRUCTURE STR LEFT JOIN CMS_${PROJECT}_RESOURCES RES ON STR.RESOURCE_ID = RES.RESOURCE_ID WHERE RES.RESOURCE_ID IS NULL ORDER BY STR.RESOURCE_PATH
